definition: (bird species of China) Indian golden oriole (Oriolus kundoo)
(bird species of China) slender-billed oriole (Oriolus tenuirostris)
(bird species of China) Eurasian golden oriole (Oriolus oriolus)
(bird species of China) black-naped oriole (Oriolus chinensis)

sentences.english: Small oriole eating the food looks very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 小黃鸝喫食物的樣子很有趣。

sentences.english: And off he went to look for the oriole .
sentences.chinese: 說完，他走了，去找那隻黃鸝。

sentences.english: I know golden orioles trill in the trees, their melody reaching the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 我也知道樹上有高鳴的黃鸝，唱著入雲的高調。

sentences.english: A canker-root stopped in that big tree .
sentences.chinese: 一隻黃鸝鳥落在那棵大樹上。

sentences.english: "Snail and Li Huang Bird" has already begun.
Two golden Orioles in the green willow.

definition: Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse

a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
